meta.name: The Curator's Wardrobe
meta.subtitle: Heritage with humor. Pattern maximalism. British countryside meets Pacific Northwest creative class.
meta.tagline: Dress like you're curating a museum exhibit of your own personality.
meta.hero_quote: Patterns are vocabulary. The more you know, the more interesting your sentences become.

products.name: Peckish Rain Skull Jersey Crew Tee
products.description: Hand-drawn quirky skull meets rain motifs. Made in Kojima, Japan's denim capital. Soft 20/- cotton jersey with deep indigo overdye option. Where heritage craft meets playful absurdity.
products.search_query: Kapital Peckish Rain Skull tee jersey

products.name: Flying Duck Tee
products.description: NIGO's iconic flying duck mascot. Vintage Americana meets Japanese craftsmanship. The warmth and personality that made this a collector's icon. Made entirely in Japan.

products.name: More Kindness Tie-Dye Tee
products.description: Started as Grateful Dead bootleg merch, evolved into wearable psychedelic art. Each piece hand-dyed in California—no two exactly alike. Collaborations with A24, Andre 3000, The North Face.

products.name: Ghost in the Shell Collaboration Tee
products.description: LA creative collective meets anime legend. Original Masamune Shirow artwork reinterpreted. Post-punk underground comics energy with pop culture depth.
products.expected_content: anime graphic tee ghost in the shell
products.search_query: Brain Dead Ghost in the Shell tee

products.name: Loiter Jacket - Big Floral Print
products.description: Daiki Suzuki's interpretation of the space between blazer and chore coat. Big floral print where heritage workwear construction meets graphic boldness. Removable buttons with metal ringlets—a factory worker detail. Made entirely in USA.

products.name: Boro Spring 1st Jacket
products.description: Japanese visible mending elevated to maximalist art. Boro cloth created at Kapital HQ using traditional sashiko stitching. Only a handful made each season because labor is so intensive. Autobiography written in thread.

products.name: Travail Work Jacket - Olive Linen
products.description: French Army workwear from the 1930s-50s, woven on vintage machinery in Lyon. Three front pockets, extra-large buttons. Fills the summer outerwear gap—heritage olive in a breathable linen weight.

products.name: Alexander Girard 'International Love' Camp Shirt
products.description: Typography-forward print from Girard's 1961 textile design. The word 'LOVE' in various languages across rich blue ground. Museum-quality mid-century design on a shirt made in Pennsylvania's family-owned factory since 1932.

products.name: Lamar Short Sleeve Ikat Shirt
products.description: Hand-woven Ikat in geometric diamond patterns. Yarns dyed BEFORE weaving—the slight blurring at edges is authentic hand-production. One tailor, one garment. From Rajasthan weavers who've practiced this for generations.

products.name: Floral Lace SS Camp Shirt
products.description: The entire shirt IS the pattern—floral lace textile, not embroidery on cotton. Completely see-through, designed over a tee or tank. Brooklyn sustainability meets Amalfi Coast vacation energy.
products.search_query: Corridor NYC Floral Lace camp shirt

products.name: Water Crest Pattern Open Collar Shirt
products.description: Abstract watercolor-style pattern with organic, almost painted quality. Japanese interpretation of American sportswear with 1950s vintage silhouette obsession. Plays well with solids without competing.

products.name: A Woolen Wonder Fair Isle Jumper
products.description: THE cult knitwear brand. Scottish Shetland wool brushed using NATURAL TEASEL BRUSHES—old-world method creating soft halo you cannot replicate industrially. Fair Isle patterns from the islands where they helped identify returning sailors.
products.search_query: Howlin A Woolen Wonder Fair Isle

products.name: French Work Pants - Blue
products.description: European workwear counterpoint to American denim. Vibrant bleu de travail impossible to achieve with indigo. High rise, full thigh, elastic back waist. Very 'guy who rides a vintage bike in Paris.'

products.name: Fatigue Pant - Olive Cotton Ripstop
products.description: Daiki Suzuki's interpretation of the OG-107. Vintage military spec high rise, straight leg with light taper. Hem holes for cinching. Ripstop adds texture that plain chinos can't match. Made in USA.

products.name: Original G-Pant
products.description: Born in 1980s Yosemite climbing culture. Integrated webbing belt with one-handed adjustment. Diamond gusseted crotch allows 180-degree splits. Moves with you in ways stiff denim never could. Colors: Cactus, Pine, Tobacco, Sand.

products.name: Alweather RF Sneaker
products.description: Made in Kurume, Japan since 1873 using vulcanized construction—shoes kiln-fired at 120°C for 70 minutes, like Japanese pottery. Canvas wrapped in rubber. Functional boot in sneaker form for Seattle rain.

products.name: Michael Derby
products.description: French family-run since 1908. Norwegian welt construction—hand-stitched, completely waterproof. 2025 is the Michael's 80th anniversary. Chunky sole, minimal 2-eyelet design. What French intellectuals wear. The anti-sleek statement.

products.name: Mountain Light Boot
products.description: THE PNW boot. Made by hand in Portland since the 1970s. Pioneered GORE-TEX in footwear. Stitchdown construction means it can be recrafted when soles wear—a lifetime purchase. Lace-to-toe for better fit control.

products.name: Ski Jacquard Crew Socks
products.description: Started in Ebisu, Tokyo 1993. Each pair woven by master artisans using specialized techniques. Bright colors, distinctive patterns, eco-friendly materials. The flash of personality when seated. Cult-like following.

products.name: CHUP Patterned Socks
products.description: Made in Japan using vintage knitting machines. Intricate patterns inspired by global folk traditions—Nordic, Native American, African. Each sock takes 6x longer to produce than standard socks.

products.name: Van Gogh Smiley Socks
products.description: Kapital's signature smiley face meets Starry Night swirls. Made in Japan. The intersection of art history and Japanese irreverence. Visible when seated, a secret handshake for those who notice.

products.name: Fastcolor Selvedge Bandana - Ikari Makuri
products.description: Iconic angry cat and anchor motif in Ukiyo-e style. Fast color selvedge cotton, discharge dyed for traditional look. Soft from day one. As pocket square, neck scarf, bag tie. Shows you know things.

products.name: Calabar Sun
products.description: Son of Oliver Peoples founder. LA heritage rather than Italian luxury house. Brad Pitt's pick. Premium acetate, handcrafted. California lifestyle without being gimmicky. Polarized options available.
